title: FT: Jennings both hands Piedmont 42. SGC 1 - TRADED
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Jennings both hands Piedmont 42. SGC 1 - TRADED
posts.post_content:
CARD IS TRADED

Looking to trade this Jennings Piedmont 42 for an EPDG. It’s graded a 1 but it’s actually a pretty decent 1 with no loss in the back. 

Looking for EPDGs of Hummel, Congalton, or Bowerman preferably if anyone has one. Otherwise would be interested in possible upgrades I need. Just shoot me a PM with what you have.

Thanks for looking!
